document_data.name: Heldorm
document_data.mainbody: '''Heldorm''' was a member of the [[Cult of the Black Earth]] at the [[Temple of the Black Earth]] in [[Tyar-Besil]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.Personality: Heldorm was an unbalanced individual. He normally spoke with himself and tittered at a series of black jests he only partially shared aloud.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], Heldorm and three fellow cultists acted as jailers in the temple's jail until some adventurers infiltrated the temple and confronted and defeated them.
